column4: If my videocard showed some tendencies of weird flickering in windows and now it freaks out almost every time it uses opengl(or maybe every time it renders 3d?) it reasonably should be the card that's broken in some way. Right?
Cause I can't find any people with my symptoms near any fglrx forums...
:or bad drivers... did you install the proper drivers in windows ?
Yeah, direct from atis website... They only make you choose operative system and I got that :)
